title: Where to go
initialText:
You ask yourself "What are these for?" and put them in your pockets.
After picking them up, you decide to go to the market anyways. You see a door with a lock, and a poker table far away with nasty people. You:

decisions.result: Okay, maybe this key will be of use...

decisions.text: Go to ask directions to those gentlemans
decisions.result: I'm sure they'll know where we are
